post.title: Shiny with TailwindCSS
post.description: A guide on how to use TailwindCSS to perform common styling tasks in Shiny applications.

body.raw:
Recently, I released the `{shiny.tailwind}` package which brings [TailwindCSS](https://tailwindcss.com/) classes to Shiny. This post is the first blog in a series of blogs that introduces TailwindCSS and shows how it can be used to quickly and easily design beautiful and responsive shiny applications ## Spacing items `gap-x-#` and `gap-y-#` ## Dynamic Layout For example, you could set a width on a sidebar and have the main content fill the rest of the window's size.
